sources.title: Assa
sources.description:
Part Two: https://youtu.be/7z4pMWQTDpQ

80s. A young girl, Alika, arrives in Yalta with her lover, crime boss Krymov, who is much older than her. Alika accidentally meets a young musician nicknamed Bananan. Gradually, girl becomes interested in Bananan and spends less and less time with Krymov - although he is an influential rich man, but what is this compared to youth and enthusiasm, with a time when the ocean is knee-deep to you? 

IMDb rating: 7.7

Year of production: 1988

Director: Sergey Soloviev
Screenwriter: Sergey Solovyov, Livnev Sergey
Composer: Boris Grebenshchikov
Cinematographer: Pavel Lebeshev
Art director: Gauhman-Sverdlov Marksen

Starring: Tatiana Drubich, Govorukhin Stanislav, Bugaev Sergey, Slivnikov Anatoly, Tsoi Viktor, Bashirov Alexander, Schorr German, Ivanov Ilya, Ryzhenko Sergey, Domogarov Alexander, Novikov Timur, Kozakov Kirill, Dolinin Dmitry, Beshlyaga Victor, Guryanov Georgy (Gustav) , Anita Zhukovskaya, Andrey Krisanov, Irena Kuksenaite, Andrey Khalyavin, Dmitry Shumilov, Yuriy Shumilo

metadata.Plot: ASSA is set in Crimea during the winter in the mid eighties. A young musician (Bananan) falls for mobster's (Krymov) young mistress (Alika). The parallel story line involves an 18th century assassination plot.
metadata.Actors: Natan Eidelman, Anatoly Slivnikov, German Shorr
